title: Pre‑Coding (K‑2)
summary: Screen‑free logic, pattern recognition, and teamwork through board‑game‑based activities.

title: Beginner Coding (Grades 3‑5)
summary: Scratch projects that build loops, conditionals, variables, and game design fundamentals.

title: AI & Entrepreneurship (Middle School)
summary: Build simple apps, practice idea pitching, and explore AI responsibly.
